question: Who designed the city of Chandigarh?
explanation: Chandigarh is the dream city of India\'s first Prime Minister, Sh. Jawahar Lal Nehru. It was planned by the famous French architectÂ Le Corbusier. It is located at the foothills of Shivaliks. It is known as one of the best experiments in urban planning and modern architecture in the twentieth century in India.
